Header: Should the TNA support or oppose the No confidence motion?
Content: COLOMBO (News 1 st ) – Questions were posed to the General Public through People’s Power online on whether Tamil National Alliance should support or oppose the PM when the No-confidence is taken up? As of 7 PM, today (April 1) 52% votes were to Oppose the PM while 48% votes were to support him. To further express your opinion, visit our official Facebook page.
